title: Circular issued on conserving fuel and power
body_lines: Taking into account the ongoing crises in the country, the Ministry of Public Services, Provincial Councils and Local Government has issued a circular on conserving fuel and electricity.
Signed by the Secretary to the Ministry, J.J. Ratnasiri, the relevant circular was published on Tuesday (March 08).
Thereby, all air conditioners at public institutions are now required to be switched off by 2.30 p.m.
Pursuant to the circular, payments made for extra fuel have also been halted.
Further, calling outstation officials to Colombo for meetings and other purposes has also been limited.
Circular on conserving fuel and power by Ada Derana on Scribd
